choose_type.description:
FusionSolar can be connected in two ways:
* **Kiosk**: This is the most easy way as you (probably) don't need any interaction with Huawei Fusion Solar, the drawback is the the realtime information is per 30 minutes.
* **OpenAPI**: You will need an OpenAPI account from Huawei, this will give you better realtime information. [More information](https://forum.huawei.com/enterprise/en/communicate-with-fusionsolar-through-an-openapi-account/thread/591478-100027).

data.type: Choose the way you want to connect to Fusion Solar

kiosk.description:
1. Sign in on the [Huawei FusionSolar portal](https://eu5.fusionsolar.huawei.com/).
2. Select your plant if needed.
3. At the top there is a button: "Kiosk", click it.
4. An overlay will open, and you need to enable the kiosk view by enabling the toggle.

openapi.description: Enter the OpenAPI credentials your received from Huawei FusionSolar below.
